input_text:
Job Title: Account Manager

Location: Detroit Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
We are conducting a confidential search for an Account Manager with a client company of ours that is a global supplier to the automotive, commercial vehicle, and off-road vehicle industries. This is a remote position, and it needs to be based in the Metro Detroit area.
This position will focus primarily on promoting, selling, and securing new business. They will target customers, programs, and identify new opportunities for business growth. Develop and cultivate relationships with customers, assist with quality issues, and visit customers. Work with engineering to develop, monitor, and manage all programs and projects. Prepare and update customer sales forecasts, marketing plans, and generate new business opportunities. Generate proposals, cost estimates, and presentations for both internal and external purposes.
Duties and Responsibilities:· Identify new opportunities to convert into new business sales for both existing and new customers.· Manage multiple customer accounts with the same product types to capitalize on potential growth opportunities.· Prepare and maintain annual sales forecasts and monthly status reports for assigned accounts.· Maintain direct contact and interfaces with customer engineering, product development, and purchasing organizations to ensure participation in new programs.· Provide exceptional customer service dealing with issues including but not limited to delivery, product quality, payments, product design, and pricing.· Update management regarding account risks and opportunities recommending actions to mitigate risk and exploit opportunities.· Participate in the development of long-term objectives including the development of strategies, goals, and plans.· Achieve or exceed sales and profit margin goals and objectives.· Coordinate product development and launches working with engineering to ensure new products meet customer expectations, specifications, and timing requirements.
This is a high-profile position, offering an excellent opportunity for continued advancement.
Candidates should possess the following qualifications:
* Bachelors degree* 3+ years experience as an Account Manager, and/or Business Development Manager* Customer experience with the automotive, commercial vehicle OEMs, and/or off-road vehicle OEMs* Strong communication skills* Self-motivated and self-directed

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Account Manager
output_json.summary: Confidential search for an Account Manager at a global supplier to the automotive, commercial vehicle, and off-road vehicle industries.
job_responsibilities: Identify new opportunities to convert into new business sales for both existing and new customers.
Manage multiple customer accounts with the same product types to capitalize on potential growth opportunities.
Prepare and maintain annual sales forecasts and monthly status reports for assigned accounts.
Maintain direct contact and interfaces with customer engineering, product development, and purchasing organizations to ensure participation in new programs.
Provide exceptional customer service dealing with issues including but not limited to delivery, product quality, payments, product design, and pricing.
Update management regarding account risks and opportunities recommending actions to mitigate risk and exploit opportunities.
Participate in the development of long-term objectives including the development of strategies, goals, and plans.
Achieve or exceed sales and profit margin goals and objectives.
Coordinate product development and launches working with engineering to ensure new products meet customer expectations, specifications, and timing requirements.
